parse.title: The Invented Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien

wikitext.*:
{{book |title=The Invented Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien:
Drawings and Original Manuscripts from the Marquette University Collection | image = The Invented Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien.jpg |author=(various) |publisher=Haggerty Museum of Art Catalogues and Gallery Guides/Marquette University |date=[[2004]] |format=Catalogue |pages=45 |isbn= |amazon= |amazonprice= }} '''''The Invented Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien: Drawings and Original Manuscripts from the Marquette University Collection''''' was first published in 2004 by [[Marquette University]] as the catalogue from the exhibition of the same name held at the Haggerty Museum of Art (October 21, 2004 - January 30, 2005). ==Contents== ===Chapters=== *"Ways of WorldMaking: J.R.R. Tolkien" (Curtis L. Carter, p. 7) * "'A Masterpiece of the Future': A Brief History of Marquette's J.R.R. Tolkien Collection" ([[Matt Blessing]], p. 17) *"The AB Language Lives" ([[Arne Zettersten]], p. 25) *J.R.R. Tolkien Biography (p. 34) *Select Tolkien Bibliography (p. 37) *"Works in the Exhibition" (Annemarie Sawkins, p. 42) ===Manuscripts=== * Illustration - The first draft version of the first page of The Book of Mazarbul. * Manuscript page - includes the first draft version of Thror’s Map. * Illustration - Isengard & Orthanc. * Manuscript page - includes the earliest sketch of the inscription and signs on the Doors of Durin. * Manuscript page - The Ring Verse in Tolkien’s characteristic handwriting, and also in tengwar. * Illustration - A page from Mr. Bliss - So he turned sharp to the right at the next turning, and ran straight into Mr.Day. * Manuscript page - includes a plan of Minas Tirith, and a topographical plan of the city and the surrounding mountains. * Illustration - A [[Letter to Father Francis Morgan|code letter from Tolkien to Father Francis Morgan]]. * Illustration - Cave paintings from The Father Christmas Letters. * Manuscript page - A synoptic time scheme used while writing LotR. It summarizes the movements of characters between the 13th and 17 March. {{title|italics}} [[Category:Exhibition catalogues|Invented Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien]] [[Category:Publications with contribution by J.R.R. Tolkien|Invented Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien]] [[Category:Publications by title|Invented Worlds of J.R.R. Tolkien]]
